data.value: After what happened to Nibelheim, I found myself at the station in the Sector 7 Slums—almost as if I were guided there. I reunited with Tifa, my childhood friend who had made this place her home, and we quickly began to make up for lost time.

Shinra took everything from me—my wife, my best friend, my right arm, my home. Marlene was all I had left, and I would've done anything to give her the life she deserves. But times were rough and I lost my direction until I met someone who showed me the way...

After suffering a horrific accident, I awoke in a clinic in the Sector 7 Slums. With nothing but a huge hospital bill to my name, I began a new life in Midgar—one that would soon lead me to make great friends and new precious memories.

I've always wanted to go on a picnic since I was little, and today's finally the day! But every time I try to have fun, something always seems to mess it up... Like that time I couldn't go out and celebrate my birthday. Will today be different? Will I finally get to enjoy a long-awaited picnic?
